help-file.title: BLESS
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> | <object> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Protection
Casting "Bless" on a victim will improve the victim's resistance to spells.
Casting "Bless" on a weapon will make it strike more accurately. You may need to repeat this if the blessing wears off. It is only possible to bless non-evil items, and there is a weight restriction based on the proficiency of the caster.
